response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity. The product we have to offer is not just any item; it holds immense value and significance, which I believe aligns perfectly with your interests and needs. Our product is valued at $1,000,000 by you, making it a perfect match for your expectations. We are extending this unique opportunity to you at a special price of $900,000. This offer represents a significant saving for you, allowing you to acquire a valuable asset at a highly favorable rate. We understand the importance of making informed decisions, so please feel free to ask any questions or request additional information. We look forward to the possibility of working together and bringing this exceptional product into your possession.", "product_price": 900000}
